title: Worlds Missions
body:
I bought the Masters pack & read that it was supposed to give me 12 additional missions the first week but so far I've only received 7.

1 of these (which is my last) I cannot complete because it says to complete 4 Worlds missions & I'm stuck on 3. 

Wasn't sure if this was a bug or if more will be added this week?

replies.body: do you know when they will be updated? because if its supposed to update every week, and the missions started last Thursday.. I feel like it should have updated already. can someone help? I got the pick em mission today and finished it, but that was all I got.
More missions will be coming later on in the week! No worries quite yet, missions will be coming out as Worlds progress towards the finals.
